Roles.Name: Administrators
Roles.Description: Default administrators role with full access to the site

Roles.Name: Guests
Roles.Description: Default unauthenticated users role (not logged in users)

Roles.Name: All Users
Roles.Description: Default all users (authenticated or unauthenticated users)

Roles.Name: Contributors
Roles.Description: Contributor users to manage pages, plugins, etc.

New See our latest progress

Welcome to FluentCMS
AI Driven ASP.NET Core Blazor Content Management System (CMS)

Building and managing content has never been easier. Experience the power of AI with FluentCMS.

Open Administration

DotNet Blazor Headless CMS

Traditional CMS systems have limitations. A headless CMS provides flexibility and scalability for creating engaging user experiences. Our CMS solution offers a modern, headless architecture that enables seamless integration with modern development tools and platforms by leveraging the power of DotNet Blazor.

AI-Driven Content Creation and Management

Businesses can improve content efficiency with AI-driven tools. AI can identify trends, analyze audience preferences, and generate personalized content. AI-powered content management systems can automate tedious tasks such as tagging, categorization, and optimization.

AI-Powered Content Management

Effortlessly create, manage, and deliver content with our AI-driven platform

Learn more

AI-Powered Writing Assistance

Utilize advanced AI to guide content creation, suggesting optimizations and improving readability.

Blazing Fast

Built on top of Blazor components for client-side operations.

Extensible

Easily extend with custom plugins and themes.

Modern UI

Sleek and intuitive dashboard for content management.

Modern CMS Needed: AI-Powered, Headless, and Flexible

Traditional CMS platforms limit customization, integration, and personalization. This restricts developers and marketers from creating engaging user experiences.

Learn more

Currently, no suitable dotnet blazor open source CMS options exist, leaving a gap in the market.
The ideal solution would be a modern, headless CMS that leverages AI for streamlined content creation and management, with a site builder for easy page creation. This would provide developers and marketers with the tools they need to create personalized, engaging experiences for their users, while also being flexible and customizable.

FluentCMS

Built for the Future of Content Management

AI-Powered Content Generation

Utilize natural language processing and machine learning algorithms to generate high-quality content for your website, blog, or e-commerce platform.

Headless Architecture

Build scalable, flexible, and secure applications using a headless CMS that separates the front and back ends, allowing for seamless integration with modern web frameworks like Blazor.

Sitebuilder Interface

Create a user-friendly interface that empowers users to easily design and customize their websites without needing extensive coding knowledge.

Intelligent Content Suggestions

Leverage AI to suggest relevant content ideas, images, and videos to enhance the user's website, based on their interests, preferences, and audience.

Adaptive Design

Utilize AI to optimize website layouts, themes, and styles based on user behavior, preferences, and device types, ensuring an optimal user experience across various platforms.

Personalized Experience

Use machine learning algorithms to analyze user behavior and preferences, providing personalized content recommendations, customized navigation, and tailored search results.

Seamless Integration

Easily integrate your CMS with popular tools and services, such as e-commerce platforms, marketing automation software, and social media management tools, using RESTful APIs and webhooks.

Advanced Analytics

Gain valuable insights into user behavior, engagement patterns, and content performance through advanced analytics and reporting tools, enabling data-driven decision-making and optimization.
